edu.wpi.grip.ui.components

Class LogTextArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.control.Control
            • javafx.scene.control.TextInputControl
              • javafx.scene.control.TextArea
                • edu.wpi.grip.ui.components.LogTextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    public class LogTextArea
extends javafx.scene.control.TextArea
    A text area that is used to display a log. Implements the ability to pause scrolling and the protection of not causing the JavaFX thread to hang if the string becomes too long.
    See Also:
    Original idea for this class

    • Method Detail

      • addLineToLog

        public void addLineToLog(java.lang.String data)
        Adds a line to the log. This will keep track of the scroll position and maintain the scroll position if scrolling is paused.
        Parameters:
        data - The line to add to the text area.

      • isPausedScroll

        public final boolean isPausedScroll()
        Returns:
        True if the scroll has been paused
